meanings.sent1: I will giveback the book I borrowed from you.
meanings.sent2: She always makes sure to giveback what she borrows.
meanings.sent3: After using your pen, I must giveback its cap!
meanings.sent4: The river will giveback what it took during the flood.
meanings.sent5: Please remember to giveback the tools after you finish using them.

meanings.definition: A charitable donation or act of kindness in return for something received.
meanings.sent1: The community organized a giveback to help those in need.
meanings.sent2: Receiving a giveback from strangers was heartwarming.
meanings.sent3: The giveback event brought smiles to many faces.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was a giveback for all the help she received.
meanings.sent5: The giveback made a significant impact on the local charity.
